title: Looking for Wardens - Volunteer Moderation
body:
> Applications: **CLOSED**
 
Hello!
 
With Wardens being tested in General Discussion and doing well, we are looking to expand to the rest of Boards. We are looking for Wardens dedicated to specific sub-boards or roamers. The list is below and you will be able to select through the application.
 
* Gameplay
* Memes & Games
* Story, Art, & Sound / Concepts & Creations
* Roleplay
* Roaming Wardens (looks over several of the smaller sub-boards)
 
The deadline for applications will be at the **_end of 6/5/2017_** and continuing with phase 2 which will include a short voice or chat roundtable interview. We will be selecting qualified candidates who possess all or most of the following attributes we are looking for.
 
> [Warden Application](https://goo.gl/forms/ZilvtaBPBPGHoShH3)
 
**Qualifications**
 
* History of frequent engagement and currently active in sub-board selected or Boards in general (roaming)
* Does not have an excessive history of breaking the [Universal Rules](https://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/player-behavior-moderation/4LgZ2EwM-universal-rules) or in-game punishments
* Open to taking constructive direction in moderation and working collaboratively with Riot
* Thick-skinned and the ability to detach personal feelings from moderation activities (stay calm and diplomatic in any situation)
 
**Warden Privileges**
 
* Name color, Warden title, and icon on the Boards
http://i.imgur.com/Gc8fJmj.png
* Visibility to reported content
* Delete discussion and comments
* Disable commenting in a discussion
* Pin a comment
* Sticky discussions
 
**Warden Expectations**
 
* Be active in the community and facilitate discussions
* Keeping the sub-board clean per Universal Rules
* Be fair and distance from favoritism
* Escalate discussions or comments as needed to Riot
* Be the voice of the community and share those concerns to Riot

What's the difference between a Warden and an Arbiter?

> [{quoted}](name=Kairoptra,realm=NA,application-id=6heBIhQc,discussion-id=y6eJHVxl,comment-id=0003,timestamp=2017-05-30T22:00:12.285+0000)
>
> What's the difference between a Warden and an Arbiter?

Great question; I'll try to tackle this the best I can. 

For starters, Arbiters are specific to the discipline of Player Behavior, but that isn't to say we don't have Wardens within the Player Behavior sub-board as well. Arbiters are individuals who have been identified as:

> deeply knowledgeable about our behavior systems to reach out to their fellow players, providing information and helping address questions and concerns you guys bring to our attention.

In contrast with Wardens, applicants need not be necessarily masters in their craft, as there's more of an emphasis on understanding community culture and being able to foster respectful and constructive discussion. You can read more about the structure of the Riot Games Volunteer Programs here:

https://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/community-moderation/TP4y93oc-introduction-to-the-riot-games-volunteer-programs

Let me know if you have any other questions!

Everyone matures and grows at different rates and in different ways, and we'll be looking at the way applicants have historically engaged in discussions in their respective sub-boards. While age isn't a hard factor, I imagine that the relationship between age and experience/behavior will be relatively noticeable.
